name: Perception19 (Albert Einstein)
description: This collection aims to generate the greatest possible number of synapses in the brain of the observer. It tries to transform an easily recognizable object and change its identity. To alter the perception to such a degree that the object could mutate and transform into another totally different thing.  Perceiving shapes, materials, feelings or, why not, even memories, is just a beginning to start changing and understanding that there are as many realities as there are stars in the universe. / Digital Collage 1Mx1M Digital HRPFile IPFS
